Warehouse Officer Job at Evans Industries Limited




        
    

        
        Evans Industries Limited, established over 20 years ago, our purpose is to develop high quality home and personal care products at an affordable price. We are an ISO 90001 – 2015 certified company therefore all our operations comply with international standards. In admiration of the high quality products, Evans Industries products have become a household name and can be found across the country.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Assist the Head of the Department in day-to-day activities of the warehouse
	Involve in the issuing out of finished goods to all customers.
	Issuing out of: Soap Noodles, All perfumes, Extracts – Titanium, Packaging Materials – outer cartons, Paper boards, BOPP film, Coding ink, Gluing.
	Ensuring proper arrangement o raw materials in the warehouse
	Budgeting and payment of weekly loading/off loading expenses.
	Printing and transferring of raw materials and packaging materials used for daily production.
	Involve in quarterly/annual stock taking of raw material stocks.
	Confirming daily output from the production records.
	Ensure an effective inventory management of Spare parts.
	Receive all spare parts and ensure necessary documentation and records.
	Issue out spare parts and ensure proper authorization and record.
	Ensure proper and easy identification of all spare parts in the store.
	Keep and render to Management the inventory reports weekly to ensure adequacy at all time.
	Ensure that all spare parts are in good condition and safe.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE qualification with 4-6 years of experience.


Method of Application

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Budget Monitoring Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Budget Monitoring Officer will be responsible for overseeing and monitoring the company&rsquo;s expenditures to ensure they align with the company&rsquo;s budget guidelines.
	This role includes analyzing budget performance, identifying variances, providing recommendations for financial efficiency, and ensuring compliance with the company&rsquo;s standard policies and procedures.
	This position requires a high level of accuracy and attention to details and the ability to work under pressure while managing multiple priorities.


Job Details
Budget Monitoring:


	Track and Monitor Budget Utilization across all departments.
	Prepare variance reports on actual and budgeted expenditures.
	Preparation of Branch Profitability Report.
	Provide recommendations to management to address budget deviations.
	Ensure adherence to organization&#39;sbudget policies and procedures.
	Follow up on transactions to ensure payments are disbursed when queriesaremade.
	Prepare payment schedule to disbursement unit.
	Properly assessing support documents.
	Ensure treatment of requisition in due time.
	Aligning of quote approvals.
	Ensuring appropriate approvals are gotten for all purchase requisitions.
	Ensuring all requisitions are aligned to appropriate codes.


Process Improvement and Automation:


	Identify areas for process improvement on the expense and budget monitoring software to ensure complete and accurate reporting.
	Identify and recommend general improvements to budgeting processes.


Collaboration and Reporting:
